item.title: How do i create a private server for people to play on?
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

If you have done it correctly, you need to give people

[ul][li]Network Name[/li]
[li]Netwrok Pass[/li]
[li]Netwrok Ip[/li][/ul]

It then should work. Runserver etc.

Read full topic

item.source: How do i create a private server for people to play on?

item.title: How do i create a private server for people to play on?
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

Downloaded moparscape? [YES] www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html
Hamachi? [YES?] www.hamachi.cc
When you’ve done that get a source from:
Downloads
then open your source [get UltimatePk if Pk or Pimp/phonescape]
then click runserver, if it says ‘you have not downloaded java JDK’ then download java JDK www.javasun.com
then run it, your ip is on your hamachi and your port is found out when you click runserver [says a number like 5555 or 43594]

Read full topic
